Title: Antaraal
Writer: Binay Kumar Mittra (screenplay), Kaberi Mittra (screenplay), Krishnendu Mukhopadhyay (screenplay), Krishnendu Mukhopadhyay
Actors: Saayoni Ghosh, Harsh Chhaya, Debashree Roy, Kharaj Mukherjee
Plot: Pre-marital pregnancy, a big town society dealing with it - clandestinely, the follies and foibles of a few individuals who get entwined with the lives of two women who come together for ...
